name: BrickBounce
description:
Hit the button corrrectly when the ball is upcoming to the brick , make the sounds right , you could play songs without the ability of playing an instrument!
You could also make your own level with our editor in game. Upload and share with others , let the others play the song you make.
From 1 button to 8 Button at the same time , you could even play an symphony if you can!
